mapper.insert: INSERT INTO common.activity_log ( user_id, level, type, text, "timestamp" ) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{level}, #{type}, #{text}, #{timestamp} );
mapper.select: SELECT l.*, u.display_name, r.role FROM common.activity_log l LEFT JOIN users.users u ON l.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN users.roles r ON u.role_id = r.id
